DOC.detailed_description: It prospective randomize study 200 woman undergo ICSI ( intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) fulfil inclusion criterion ( Difficult mock embryo transfer day ovum pick , Women 's age 20-38 yaears , Early follicular FSH ≤10 IU/l , Tubal , male infertility , unexplained factor infertility . ) recruit . All patient receive long stimulation protocol ; regulation achieve administration triptorelin0.1 mg ( decapeptyl 0.1 mg , Ferring , Malmo , sweden ) S.C daily day 21 cycle precede stimulation cycle till day hCG administration. , regulation check day 2 stimulation cycle check serum E2˂50 pg/ml , endometrial thickness ˂ 5mm quiescent ovary . When regulation achieve stimulation commence use hmG ( Menogon , ferring pharmaceutical , Germany ) 225 IU daily intramuscular injection , Serial trans-vaginal ultrasound ass follicular growth serum E2 do start day 6 cycle onward , adjustment gonadotropin dose monitoring frequency base patient response . Once 3 leading follicle reached≥18mm hCG 10000 IU ( Pregnyl ; NV Organon ) administrate IM . Ovum pick do 34-36 hour follow hCG administration ultrasound guidance general anesthesia.after mock embryo transfer do use labotec embryo transfer catheter woman degree difficulty accord Tomas et al . 2002 criterion recruit study divide randomly two group accord computer generate random card ; group A ( n=100 ) : receive indomethacin 100 mg rectal supp ( KAHIRA PHARMA & CHEM , IND , CO.CAIRO-EGYPT ) 1-2 hour embryo transfer , group B ( n=100 ) receive medication embryo transfer . Embryo transfer 2 embryo do technique lithotomy position full bladder ultrasound guidance 2-3 day ovum pick depend number quality available embryo use labotec catheter ( Labotec , Gottingen Germanny ) . Luteal phase achieve Using progesterone vaginal pessary ( Cyclogest , Alpharma , UK ) 400 mg twice daily day egg collection till day pregnancy test continue till 12 week gestation pregnancy document .
DOC.criteria: Infertile patient undergo ICSI cycle difficult mock transfer do day day ovum pick repeat ICSI failure Easy mock embryo transfer day ovum pick Early follicular FSH > 10 IU/l Past history allergy NSAID .
